mapper.select: SELECT id, photo_name, album_id, album_name, photo_description, user_id, like_amount, url, creation_time, modification_time, url FROM photo WHERE album_id IN ( SELECT id FROM album WHERE city_id = ( SELECT id FROM city WHERE city_name = #{cityName} ) AND province_id = ( SELECT id FROM province WHERE province_name = #{provinceName} ) AND city_id IS NOT NULL ) AND album_id = #{albumId} AND id = #{photoId}
